articles.title: MSHSL says it will allow student-athletes to compete according to their gender identity - KSTP
articles.description: The Minnesota State High School League will continue its policy of letting student athletes to "participate consistent with their gender identity," according to a memo sent to MSHSL member schools on Thursday.

articles.title: Chiefs offense defined by selfless WR room: 'Raising up that trophy is always better than being the No. 1 guy' - NFL.com
articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs roll into Super Bowl LIX with an aerial attack led by a receiving corp defined by its selflessness. NFL.com's Kevin Patra details how DeAndre Hopkins, Xavier Worthy and the rest of the Chiefs WRs have gelled this year.
